问题原因\n\n 前端加载了15条标记,但在阅读页面匹配时失败了,因为字段不匹配:\n - 章节API返回的section用的是 sectionId (数字: 1, 2, 3...)\n - 标记API返回的用的是 sectionId (UUID)\n\n 解决方案\n\n 现在后端已经修改完成,标记API同时返回了:\n {\n \"sectionId\": \"52ff69f0-565b-4120-ad6e-e1640b809bb8\", //\n UUID\n \"sectionOrder\": 1, // 数字序号\n \"book\": {...},\n \"chapter\": {...}\n }\n\n 前端需要修改匹配逻辑:\n\n 方案1: 使用 UUID 匹配 (推荐)\n\n // 在阅读页面加载章节时\n func loadChapter() {\n // 1. 加载章节内容\n let sections = chapterData.sections // 每个section有 id\n (UUID) 和 sectionId (数字)\n\n // 2. 加载用户标记\n let userMarks = loadedMarks // 从 API 获取的标记列表\n\n // 3. 创建标记字典 - 使用 section.id (UUID) 作为 key\n var markDict: [String: Mark] = [:]\n for mark in userMarks {\n // 使用 mark.sectionId (UUID) 作为 key\n markDict[mark.sectionId] = mark\n }\n\n // 4. 为每个段落匹配标记\n for section in sections {\n // 使用 section.id (UUID) 来匹配\n if let mark = markDict[section.id] {\n // 找到了标记!\n section.userMark = mark\n\n // 应用标记效果\n if mark.isFavorite {\n // 显示收藏图标\n }\n if let highlightColor = mark.highlightColor {\n // 应用高亮颜色\n }\n if !mark.note.isEmpty {\n // 显示笔记图标\n }\n }\n }\n }\n\n 方案2: 使用数字序号匹配 (备选)\n\n func loadChapter() {\n let sections = chapterData.sections\n let userMarks = loadedMarks\n\n // 创建标记字典 - 使用 sectionOrder (数字) 作为 key\n var markDict: [Int: Mark] = [:]\n for mark in userMarks {\n // ⚠️ 确保只匹配当前书籍和章节的标记\n if mark.book.bookId == currentBookId &&\n mark.chapter.chapterId == currentChapterId {\n markDict[mark.sectionOrder] = mark\n }\n }\n\n // 为每个段落匹配标记\n for section in sections {\n // 使用 section.sectionId (数字) 来匹配\n if let mark = markDict[section.sectionId] {\n section.userMark = mark\n // 应用标记效果...\n }\n }\n }\n\n 关键点\n\n 1. 章节API返回的section结构:\n {\n \"id\": \"52ff69f0-565b-4120-ad6e-e1640b809bb8\", // UUID\n \"sectionId\": 1, // 数字序号\n \"original\": \"天命之謂性...\",\n \"userMark\": { // 如果有标记,这里会有数据\n \"id\": \"c5c7058d...\",\n \"isFavorite\": true,\n \"highlightColor\": \"green\",\n \"note\": \"\"\n }\n }\n\n 2. 标记列表API返回的结构:\n {\n \"id\": \"c5c7058d-b762-4202-be43-69584eba8d27\",\n \"sectionId\": \"52ff69f0-565b-4120-ad6e-e1640b809bb8\", //\n UUID - 用这个匹配 section.id\n \"sectionOrder\": 1, // 数字 - 用这个匹配 sectionId=\\\\(section.sectionId)\\\")\\n }\\n \\n print(\\\"\\\\n\\u7528\\u6237\\u6807\\u8bb0ID\\u5217\\u8868:\\\")\\n for (index, mark) in userMarks.enumerated() {\\n print(\\\" [\\\\(index)] sectionId=\\\\(mark.sectionId), sectionOrder=\\\\(mark.sectionOrder)\\\")\\n }\\n \\n print(\\\"\\\\n\\u5339\\u914d\\u7ed3\\u679c:\\\")\\n for section in sections {\\n if let mark = section.userMark {\\n print(\\\" \\u2705 section.id=\\\\(section.id) \\u5339\\u914d\\u5230\\u6807\\u8bb0\\\")\\n } else {\\n print(\\\" \\u274c section.id=\\\\(section.id) \\u672a\\u5339\\u914d\\\")\\n }\\n }\\n}\\n```\\n\\n### 2. \\u9a8c\\u8bc1API\\u8fd4\\u56de\\u6570\\u636e\\n\\n```swift\\n// \\u52a0\\u8f7d\\u7ae0\\u8282\\u65f6,\\u6bcf\\u4e2asection\\u5df2\\u7ecf\\u5305\\u542buserMark\\nfunc displaySection(_ section: ClassicsSection) {\\n // 记录3: isFavorite=null, highlight=null, note=\"笔记\"\n\n 正确的后端修改方案\n\n 后端应该在数据库层或API层合并数据，每个 sectionId\n 只返回一条记录，包含所有标记类型：\n\n {\n \"id\": \"uuid\",\n \"sectionId\": \"uuid\",\n \"isFavorite\": true, // ✅ 合并\n \"highlight\": \"yellow\", // ✅ 合并\n \"note\": \"这句话很有道理\", // ✅ 合并\n \"section\": {...}\n }\n\n 后端SQL修改建议\n\n 如果后端是从不同表查询的，需要使用 JOIN + COALESCE 合并：\n\n SELECT\n m.section_id,\n COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN m.is_favorite = TRUE THEN TRUE\n END), FALSE) as is_favorite,\n MAX(m.highlight) as highlight,\n MAX(m.note) as note,\n s.original,\n s.book_id,\n s.chapter_id,\n b.title as book_title,\n c.title as chapter_title\n FROM marks m\n LEFT JOIN sections s ON m.section_id = s.id\n LEFT JOIN books b ON s.book_id = b.book_id\n LEFT JOIN chapters c ON s.chapter_id = c.chapter_id\n WHERE m.user_id = ?\n GROUP BY m.section_id, s.original, s.book_id, s.chapter_id,\n b.title, c.title\n ORDER BY m.created_at DESC\n\n 关键点：\n 1. GROUP BY section_id - 按段落分组\n 2. MAX() - 取非空值\n 3. COALESCE - 合并收藏标记\n\n 这样每个 sectionId 只返回一条记录，前端就不需要合并逻辑了！\n\n
